DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and PK of single oral doses of JTT-252 and the effect of food on the PK of JTT-252 in healthy subjects, and to evaluate the safety, tolerability, PK and PD of single oral doses of JTT-252 in type 2 diabetes mellitus subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Single Oral Doses of JTT-252
